gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 125, Hawks 119
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Hawks, 125-119. Desmond Bane led the Grizzlies with 37 points, six rebounds, and six assists as Jas Morant added 30 points, six rebounds, and 11 assists. Trae Young led the Hawks with 30 points, five rebounds, and 13 assists while Dejounte Murray tallied 26 points. The Grizzlies have now won three straight and improve to 9-19 as the Hawks move to 12-17.
